set3: Each weapon hit grants 1 stack of Deviant Energy. Every stack of Deviant Energy grants 1% Elemental DMG (Blaze, Frost, Shock, Blast). Effect can stack up to 20 times. Reloading removes half of the total stacks.
set4: Increase max Deviant Energy stack by 10. Grant 2 additional stacks when hitting a weakspot.
